 374 |   --color-cyan-light: #56a6b2;

 438 |   /*! Layout-colors colors*/
 439 |   --color-content: #f3f6f8;
 440 |   --color-header: #ffffff;
 441 |   --color-login: #ffffff;
 442 |   /*! Border Radius */
 443 |   --border-radius-s: 4px;
 444 |   --border-radius-l: 100px;
 445 |   --border-radius-none: 0px;
 446 |   /*! Border Size */
 447 |   --border-size-none: 0px;
 448 |   --border-size-s: 1px;
 449 |   --border-size-m: 2px;
 450 |   --border-size-l: 3px;
 451 |   /*! Space - Sizes */
 452 |   --space-none: 0px;
 453 |   --space-xs: 4px;
 454 |   --space-s: 8px;
 455 |   --space-base: 16px;
 456 |   --space-m: 24px;
 457 |   --space-l: 32px;
 458 |   --space-xl: 40px;
 459 |   --space-xxl: 48px;
 460 |   /*! Elevation / Shadow */
 461 |   --shadow-none: 0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
 462 |   --shadow-xs: 0px 1px 2px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 463 |   --shadow-s: 0px 2px 4px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 464 |   --shadow-m: 0px 4px 6px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 465 |   --shadow-l: 0px 6px 8px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 466 |   --shadow-xl: 0px 8px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 467 |   --shadow-xxl: 0px 12px 14px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 468 | }

Dropdown ServerSide\n        6.7.2. Dropdown ServerSide Item\n    6.8. Deprecated Patterns\n        6.8.1. Accordion\n        6.8.2. Button Loading\n        6.8.3. Carousel\n        6.8.4. Datepicker\n        6.8.5. Dropdown Search an Tags (Common)\n        6.8.6. Dropdown Search\n        6.8.7. Dropdown Tags\n        6.8.8. Flip Content\n        6.8.9. Gallery\n        6.8.10. Horizontal Scroll\n        6.8.11. Notification\n        6.8.12. Progress Bar\n        6.8.13. Progress Circle\n        6.8.14. Progress Circle Fraction\n        6.8.15. Section Index\n        6.8.16. Sidebar\n        6.8.17. Submenu\n        6.8.18. Tabs\n        6.8.19. Tooltip\n        6.8.20. Video\n7. Usefull Classes\n    7.1. a11y (Accessibility)\n    7.2. Colors - Brand\n    7.3. Colors - Neutral\n    7.4. Colors - Palette\n    7.5. Colors - Semantic\n    7.6. Colors - Others\n    7.7. Text\n    7.8. Typography\n    7.9. Border Size\n    7.10. Service Studio Preview\n*/\n\n@import \"00-Framework/01-foundations/font\";\n/*! 0. Root - CSS Variables */\n@import \"00-Framework/01-foundations/root\";\n@import \"01-Customer/01-foundations/root\";\n\n/*!  7.2. Colors */\n@import \"00-Framework/05-useful/colors\";\n/*!  7.7. Shadow */\n@import \"00-Framework/05-useful/shadow\";\n","/* ===================================================================== */\n/* Form Controls\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t */\n/* ===================================================================== */\n\n@mixin form-control-borders {\n\t@if ($form-controls-border-radius!= null) {\n\t\tborder-radius: $form-controls-border-radius;\n\t}\n\t@if (\n\t\t$form-controls-border-color!=\n\t\t\tnull and\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-size!=\n\t\t\tnull and\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-style!=\n\t\t\tnull\n\t) {\n\t\tborder: $form-controls-border-size\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-style\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-color;\n\t} @else {\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-color!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-color: $form-controls-border-color;\n\t\t}\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-size!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-width: $form-controls-border-size;\n\t\t}\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-style!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-style: $form-controls-border-style;\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n\n@mixin form-control-borders-hover {\n\t@if ($form-controls-border-radius-hover!= \"\") {\n\t\tborder-radius: $form-controls-border-radius-hover;\n\t}\n\t@if (\n\t\t$form-controls-border-color-hover!=\n\t\t\tnull and\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-size-hover!=\n\t\t\tnull and\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-style-hover!=\n\t\t\tnull\n\t) {\n\t\tborder: $form-controls-border-size-hover\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-style-hover\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-color-hover;\n\t} @else {\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-color-hover!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-color: $form-controls-border-color-hover;\n\t\t}\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-size-hover!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-width: $form-controls-border-size-hover;\n\t\t}\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-style-hover!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-style: $form-controls-border-style-hover;\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n\n@mixin form-control-borders-focus {\n\t@if ($form-controls-border-radius-focus!= \"\") {\n\t\tborder-radius: $form-controls-border-radius-focus;\n\t}\n\t@if (\n\t\t$form-controls-border-color-focus!=\n\t\t\tnull and\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-size-focus!=\n\t\t\tnull and\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-style-focus!=\n\t\t\tnull\n\t) {\n\t\tborder: $form-controls-border-size-focus\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-style-focus\n\t\t\t$form-controls-border-color-focus;\n\t} @else {\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-color-focus!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-color: $form-controls-border-color-focus;\n\t\t}\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-size-focus!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-width: $form-controls-border-size-focus;\n\t\t}\n\t\t@if ($form-controls-border-style-focus!= null) {\n\t\t\tborder-style: $form-controls-border-style-focus;\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","/*Colors*/\n\n$color-excluders: primary, secondary, neutral-0, neutral-1, neutral-2, neutral-3,\n\tneutral-4, neutral-5, neutral-6, neutral-7, neutral-8, neutral-9, neutral-10,\n\terror-base, error-light, warning-base, warning-light, success-base,\n\tsuccess-light, info-base, info-light, red, red-lightest, red-lighter,\n\tred-light, red-dark, red-darker, red-darkest, orange, orange-lightest,\n\torange-lighter, orange-light, orange-dark, orange-darker, orange-darkest,\n\tyellow, yellow-lightest, yellow-lighter, yellow-light, yellow-dark,\n\tyellow-darker, yellow-darkest, lime, lime-lightest, lime-lighter, lime-light,\n\tlime-dark, lime-darker, lime-darkest, green, green-lightest, green-lighter,\n\tgreen-light, green-dark, green-darker, green-darkest, teal, teal-lightest,\n\tteal-lighter, teal-light, teal-dark, teal-darker, teal-darkest, cyan,\n\tcyan-lightest, cyan-lighter, cyan-light, cyan-dark, cyan-darker, cyan-darkest,\n\tblue, blue-lightest, blue-lighter, blue-light, blue-dark, blue-darker,\n\tblue-darkest, indigo, indigo-lightest, indigo-lighter, indigo-light,\n\tindigo-dark, indigo-darker, indigo-darkest, violet, violet-lightest,\n\tviolet-lighter, violet-light, violet-dark, violet-darker, violet-darkest,\n\tgrape, grape-lightest, grape-lighter, grape-light, grape-dark, grape-darker,\n\tgrape-darkest, pink, pink-lightest, pink-lighter, pink-light, pink-dark,\n\tpink-darker, pink-darkest;\n\n/* Spacing */\n\n$space-excluders: none, xs, s, base, m, l, xl, xxl;\n\n/* Font size */\n\n$typography-size-exluders: display, base, xs, s, label;\n$typography-heading-size-excluders: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6;\n$typography-weight-excluders: light, regular, semi-bold, bold;\n\n/* Shadow */\n$shadow-excluders: none, xs, s, m, l, xl;\n\n/* Border */\n$border-size-excluders: none, s, m, l;\n$border-radius-excluders: none, soft, rounded, circle;\n","/* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */\n/* Typography\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t                                  */\n/* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */\n\n/// Typography sizes\n$customer-typography-sizes: map-get($globals, typography, sizes);\n$customer-typography-sizes: () !default;\n/// Typography Headings sizes\n$customer-typography-heading-sizes: map-get($globals, typography, headingSizes);\n$customer-typography-heading-sizes: () !default;\n/// Typography Weight\n$customer-typography-weight: map-get($globals, typography, weight);\n$customer-typography-weight: () !default;\n\n$customer-text-styles: map-get($globals, textStyles);\n$customer-text-styles: () !default;\n","/* ===================================================================== */\n/* Form Controls\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t */\n/* ===================================================================== */\n\n$use-global-form-controls-settings: true;\n\n///Default\n\n$form-controls-border-radius: var(--border-radius-m);\n$form-controls-border-color: var(--color-red);\n$form-controls-border-size: 2px;\n$form-controls-border-style: solid;\n\n/// Hover\n\n$form-controls-border-radius-hover: null;\n$form-controls-border-color-hover: var(--color-red);\n$form-controls-border-size-hover: 3px;\n$form-controls-border-style-hover: dashed;\n\n/// Focus\n$form-controls-border-radius-focus: null;\n$form-controls-border-color-focus: var(--color-primary);\n$form-controls-border-size-focus: null;\n$form-controls-border-style-focus: null;\n","/* ===================================================================== */\n/*  Include Fonts\n/* ===================================================================== */\n$use-custom-font-heading: true;\n\n$font-url: \"/\" + map-get($globals, customer, themeModule) + \"/\";\n$font-url: \"\" !default;\n$font-name: map-get($globals, font, name); //$customerFontName;\n$font-name: \"\" !default;\n$font-faces: map-get($globals, font, fontFaces);\n$font-faces: () !default;\n$heading-font-name: map-get($globals, font, headingsName);\n$heading-font-name: \"\" !default;\n$heading-font-faces: map-get($globals, font, headingFontFaces);\n$heading-font-faces: () !default;\n","/* \"bottom-left\";\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n@use \"sass:map\";\n@import \"/src/styles/00-Framework/00-abstract/font-weight-map\";\n\n/* ============================================================================ */\n/* Include Fonts                                                                */\n/* ============================================================================ */\n$font-faces: ();\n$currentFontMap: ();\n$currentFontFamily: \"\";\n$currentFontWeight: \"\";\n\n@each $platform in $customer-text-styles {\n\t@each $style in map-get($platform, values) {\n\t\t$styleName: map-get($style, name);\n\t\t@each $styleVariant in map-get($style, styles) {\n\t\t\t$variantName: map-get($styleVariant, name);\n\n\t\t\t@each $styleValue in map-get($styleVariant, styleValues) {\n\t\t\t\t@if (map-get($styleValue, key) == \"font-family\") {\n\t\t\t\t\t$currentFontFamily: map-get($styleValue, value);\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t@if (map-get($styleValue, key) == \"font-weight\") {\n\t\t\t\t\t$currentFontWeight: map-get($styleValue, value);\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t$currentFontMap: (\n\t\t\t\t$currentFontFamily: $currentFontWeight,\n\t\t\t);\n\n\t\t\t@if (\n\t\t\t\tnot map-has-key($font-faces, $currentFontFamily + $currentFontWeight)\n\t\t\t) {\n\t\t\t\t$font-faces: map.set(\n\t\t\t\t\t$font-faces,\n\t\t\t\t\t$currentFontFamily + $currentFontWeight,\n\t\t\t\t\t$currentFontMap\n\t\t\t\t);\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t$currentFontMap: ();\n\t\t\t$currentFontFamily: \"\";\n\t\t\t$currentFontWeight: \"\";\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n\n@each $font-face in $font-faces {\n\t@each $a, $b in $font-faces {\n\t\t@each $c, $d in $b {\n\t\t\t@font-face {\n\t\t\t\tfont-family: #{$c};\n\t\t\t\tsrc: url(\"/src/resources/fonts/#{$c+\"-\"+getFontWeightName($d)}.ttf\")\n\t\t\t\t\tformat(\"truetype\");\n\t\t\t\tfont-weight: #{$d};\n\t\t\t\tfont-style: normal;\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n@use \"sass:string\";\n\n:root {\n\t@if (length($customer-colors) !=0) {\n\t\t@each $pallete in $customer-colors {\n\t\t\t$name: to-upper-case(str-slice(#{map-get($pallete, palleteName)}, 1, 1)) +\n\t\t\t\tstr-slice(#{map-get($pallete, palleteName)}, 2);\n\t\t\t/*! #{$name} colors*/\n\t\t\t@each $color in map-get($pallete, values) {\n\t\t\t\t$color-key: map-get($color, key);\n\t\t\t\t@if map-has-key($color, \"singleValue\") {\n\t\t\t\t\t--color-#{$color-key}: #{map-get($color, singleValue)};\n\t\t\t\t} @else if(map-has-key($color, \"compostValues\")) {\n\t\t\t\t\t@each $variation in map-get($color, compostValues) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t@if (map-get($variation, key) ==$color-key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t--color-#{'' + $color-key}: #{map-get($variation, singleValue)};\n\t\t\t\t\t\t} @else {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t--color-#{'' + $color-key}-#{map-get($variation, key)}: #{map-get(\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$variation,\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tsingleValue\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t)};\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@if (length($customer-border-radius-types) !=0) {\n\t\t/*! Border Radius */\n\t\t@each $radius in $customer-border-radius-types {\n\t\t\t--border-radius-#{map-get($radius,key)}: #{map-get($radius, value)};\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@if (length($customer-border-size) !=0) {\n\t\t/*! Border Size */\n\t\t@each $size in $customer-border-size {\n\t\t\t--border-size-#{map-get($size,key)}: #{map-get($size, value)};\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@if (length($customer-sizes) !=0) {\n\t\t/*! Space - Sizes */\n\t\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t\t--space-#{map-get($space,key)}: #{map-get($space, value)};\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@if (length($customer-shadow-types) !=0) {\n\t\t/*! Elevation / Shadow */\n\t\t@each $shadow in $customer-shadow-types {\n\t\t\t--shadow-#{map-get($shadow,key)}: #{map-get($shadow, value)};\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n\n/*! Text */\n\n@each $pallete in map-get($globals, \"colors\") {\n\t$name: to-upper-case(str-slice(#{map-get($pallete, palleteName)}, 1, 1)) +\n\t\tstr-slice(#{map-get($pallete, palleteName)}, 2);\n\n\t.text {\n\t\t@each $color in map-get($pallete, values) {\n\t\t\t$color-key: map-get($color, key);\n\t\t\t@if map-has-key($color, \"singleValue\") {\n\t\t\t\t@if not list.index($color-excluders, $color-key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t&-#{$color-key} {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tcolor: var(--color-#{$color-key});\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t} @else if(map-has-key($color, \"compostValues\")) {\n\t\t\t\t@each $variation in map-get($color, compostValues) {\n\t\t\t\t\t@if (map-get($variation, key) ==$color-key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t@if not list.index($color-excluders, $color-key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t&-#{\"\" + $color-key} {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tcolor: var(--color-#{\"\" + $color-key});\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t} @else {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t@if not\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tlist.index(\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$color-excluders,\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$color-key + \"-\" + map-get($variation, key)\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t)\n\t\t\t\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t&-#{\"\" + $color-key}-#{map-get($variation, key)} {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tcolor: var(\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t--color-#{\"\" + $color-key}-#{map-get($variation, key)}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n\n/*! Background */\n@each $pallete in map-get($globals, \"colors\") {\n\t$name: to-upper-case(str-slice(#{map-get($pallete, palleteName)}, 1, 1)) +\n\t\tstr-slice(#{map-get($pallete, palleteName)}, 2);\n\t.background {\n\t\t@each $color in map-get($pallete, values) {\n\t\t\t$color-key: map-get($color, key);\n\t\t\t@if map-has-key($color, \"singleValue\") {\n\t\t\t\t@if not list.index($color-excluders, $color-key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t&-#{$color-key} {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tbackground: var(--color-#{$color-key});\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t} @else if(map-has-key($color, \"compostValues\")) {\n\t\t\t\t@each $variation in map-get($color, compostValues) {\n\t\t\t\t\t@if (map-get($variation, key) ==$color-key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t@if not list.index($color-excluders, $color-key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t&-#{\"\" + $color-key} {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tbackground: var(--color-#{\"\" + $color-key});\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t} @else {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t@if not\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tlist.index(\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$color-excluders,\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t$color-key + \"-\" + map-get($variation, key)\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t)\n\t\t\t\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t&-#{\"\" + $color-key}-#{map-get($variation, key)} {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tbackground: var(\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t--color-#{\"\" + $color-key}-#{map-get($variation, key)}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t);\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n/* Typography */\n\n\n\t@each $platform in $customer-text-styles {\n\t\t.#{map-get($platform,platform)} .text {\n\t\t@each $style in map-get($platform, values) {\n\t\t\t$styleName: map-get($style, name);\n\t\t\t@each $styleVariant in map-get($style, styles) {\n\t\t\t\t$variantName: map-get($styleVariant, name);\n\t\t\t\t&-#{$styleName}-#{$variantName} {\n\t\t\t\t\t@each $styleValue in map-get($styleVariant, styleValues) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t#{map-get($styleValue,key)}: #{map-get($styleValue, value)};\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n\n/*Border Size */\n.border {\n\t&-size {\n\t\t@each $size in map-get($globals, \"borders\", size) {\n\t\t\t$key: map-get($size, key);\n\t\t\t@if not list.index($border-size-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t\t&-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\t@if $key == \"none\" {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tborder-width: var(--border-size-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t\t} @else {\n\t\t\t\t\t\tborder: var(--border-size-#{$key}) solid currentColor;\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\t& {\n\t\t@each $customer-box-side in $customer-box-sides {\n\t\t\t@each $size in map-get($globals, \"borders\", size) {\n\t\t\t\t$key: map-get($size, key);\n\t\t\t\t@if not list.index($border-size-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t\t\t@if $key != \"none\" {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t// Generated - Eg: .border-top-s\n\t\t\t\t\t\t&-#{$customer-box-side}-#{$key}:not(.columns),\n\t\t\t\t\t\t&-#{$customer-box-side}-#{$key}.columns\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t> .columns-item:not(:last-child) {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tborder-#{$customer-box-side}: var(--border-size-#{$key})\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tsolid\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tcurrentColor;\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n\n/* Border Radius */\n.border-radius {\n\t@each $radius in map-get($globals, \"borders\", radius) {\n\t\t$key: map-get($radius, key);\n\t\t@if not list.index($border-radius-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t&-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\tborder-radius: var(--border-radius-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t@each $customer-box-corner in $customer-box-corners {\n\t\t\t\t// Generated - Eg: .border-radius-top-left-none\n\t\t\t\t&-#{$customer-box-corner}-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tborder-#{$customer-box-corner}-radius: var(--border-radius-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t@each $customer-border-side, $customer-border-corner1,\n\t\t\t\t$customer-border-corner2 in $customer-border-radius-box-sides\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\t// Generated - Eg: .border-radius-top-none\n\t\t\t\t&-#{$customer-border-side}-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tborder-#{$customer-border-side}-#{$customer-border-corner1}-radius: var(\n\t\t\t\t\t\t--border-radius-#{$key}\n\t\t\t\t\t);\n\t\t\t\t\tborder-#{$customer-border-side}-#{$customer-border-corner2}-radius: var(\n\t\t\t\t\t\t--border-radius-#{$key}\n\t\t\t\t\t);\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n/* Margin */\n.margin {\n\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t$key: map-get($space, key);\n\t\t@if not list.index($space-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t&-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\tmargin: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\t@each $customer-box-side in $customer-box-sides {\n\t\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t\t$key: map-get($space, key);\n\t\t\t@if not list.index($space-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t\t&-#{$customer-box-side}-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tmargin-#{$customer-box-side}: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t$key: map-get($space, key);\n\t\t@if not list.index($space-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t&-x-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\tmargin-left: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\tmargin-right: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t&-y-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\tmargin-bottom: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\tmargin-top: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n\n// IsRTL -------------------------------------------------------------------------\n///\n.is-rtl {\n\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t$key: map-get($space, key);\n\t\t@if not list.index($space-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t.margin {\n\t\t\t\t&-right-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tmargin-left: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t\tmargin-right: var(--space-none);\n\t\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t\t&-left-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tmargin-left: var(--space-none);\n\t\t\t\t\tmargin-right: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n/* Padding */\n.padding {\n\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t$key: map-get($space, key);\n\t\t@if not list.index($space-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t&-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\tpadding: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\t@each $customer-box-side in $customer-box-sides {\n\t\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t\t$key: map-get($space, key);\n\t\t\t@if not list.index($space-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t\t&-#{$customer-box-side}-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tpadding-#{$customer-box-side}: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@each $space in var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t&-y-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\tpadding-bottom: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\tpadding-top: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n\n// IsRTL -------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n.is-rtl {\n\t@each $space in $customer-sizes {\n\t\t$key: map-get($space, key);\n\t\t@if not list.index($space-excluders, $key) {\n\t\t\t.padding {\n\t\t\t\t&-right-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tpadding-left: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t\tpadding-right: var(--space-none);\n\t\t\t\t}\n\n\t\t\t\t&-left-#{$key} {\n\t\t\t\t\tpadding-left: var(--space-none);\n\t\t\t\t\tpadding-right: var(--space-#{$key});\n\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n","@use \"sass:list\";\n/* Shadow */\n.shadow {\n\t@each $shadow in var(--shadow-#{$key});\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t}\n}\n"],"sourceRoot":""}]);
